materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of the bark of a Gutta percha tree by a water body. The thick bark of the tree, with numerous hanging roots, is on the left foreground of the photograph. The edges of the photograph are curved. The title is handwritten at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Gutta Percha Tree in the Gardens of the Governor General, Buitenzorg, Java
subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Bogor (Indonesia) Istana Bogor (Bogor, Indonesia) Gutta-percha
